metadata.synopsis: Wyll points out that he used to kill big monsters, and now a few goblins are a challenge. What gives? Gale remarks it must be the tadpole.

1.speaker: Wyll
1.text: Was a time I tussled with hill giants without breaking a sweat.

0.speaker: Wyll
0.text: Now, a mere werebear could swat me halfway to Amn.
0.context: NodeContext: Amn = city on the Sword Coast. Pronounced "AAHM" like UK Eng "arm".

2.speaker: Gale
2.text: Strange things are happening to us. What festers in our minds may well impel our bodies.
